trans-unit.source: Versions
trans-unit.target: Versions

trans-unit.source: Azure Search Service Versioning
trans-unit.target: Azure Search Service Versioning

trans-unit.source: In Azure Search, the Service REST APIs are versioned so that your existing applications are not affected when new features are rolled out.
trans-unit.target: In Azure Search, the Service REST APIs are versioned so that your existing applications are not affected when new features are rolled out.

trans-unit.source: Versions are specified through the <codeInline>api-version</codeInline> parameter, required on every request.
trans-unit.target: Versions are specified through the <codeInline>api-version</codeInline> parameter, required on every request.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how the parameter is specified:
trans-unit.target: The following example illustrates how the parameter is specified:

trans-unit.source: Although each request has an <codeInline>api-version</codeInline>, we recommend that you use the same version for all API requests.
trans-unit.target: Although each request has an <codeInline>api-version</codeInline>, we recommend that you use the same version for all API requests.

trans-unit.source: This is especially true when new API versions introduce attributes or operations that are not recognized by previous versions.
trans-unit.target: This is especially true when new API versions introduce attributes or operations that are not recognized by previous versions.

trans-unit.source: Mixing API versions can have unintended consequences and should be avoided.
trans-unit.target: Mixing API versions can have unintended consequences and should be avoided.

trans-unit.source: Valid values for the Service REST API include:
trans-unit.target: Valid values for the Service REST API include:

trans-unit.source: (new)
trans-unit.target: (new)

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>2015-02-28-Preview</codeInline> <legacyBold>(new)</legacyBold>
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>2015-02-28-Preview</codeInline> <legacyBold>(new)</legacyBold>

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline> introduces a breaking change for the <languageKeyword>Suggestion operation</languageKeyword>, with the introduction of the suggesters API (see <link xlink:href="ecafed05-c746-4d9e-ac8e-653066e909b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Index (Azure Search Service REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="b3fed159-774d-42e0-8ded-ee453f6cd857" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suggestions (Azure Search Service REST API)</link> for details).
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline> introduces a breaking change for the <languageKeyword>Suggestion operation</languageKeyword>, with the introduction of the suggesters API (see <link xlink:href="ecafed05-c746-4d9e-ac8e-653066e909b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Index (Azure Search Service REST API)</link> and <link xlink:href="b3fed159-774d-42e0-8ded-ee453f6cd857" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suggestions (Azure Search Service REST API)</link> for details).

trans-unit.source: It is the only breaking change.
trans-unit.target: It is the only breaking change.

trans-unit.source: <codeInline>2015-02-28-Preview</codeInline> introduces the same breaking change for the <languageKeyword>Suggestion operation</languageKeyword>, but it also provides the natural language analyzers from Microsoft (used by Office and Bing) and the <codeInline>moreLikeThis</codeInline> query feature.
trans-unit.target: <codeInline>2015-02-28-Preview</codeInline> introduces the same breaking change for the <languageKeyword>Suggestion operation</languageKeyword>, but it also provides the natural language analyzers from Microsoft (used by Office and Bing) and the <codeInline>moreLikeThis</codeInline> query feature.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an older preview version, we recommend migrating to the generally available (GA) version.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an older preview version, we recommend migrating to the generally available (GA) version.

trans-unit.source: Guidance for code migration can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Transition from preview to GA</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/search-transition-from-preview/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Guidance for code migration can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Transition from preview to GA</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/search-transition-from-preview/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: In contrast with the Service REST API, the Management REST API has one version: <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: In contrast with the Service REST API, the Management REST API has one version: <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The previous version, <codeInline>2014-07-31-Preview</codeInline>, is deprecated and will be removed from the service in the future.
trans-unit.target: The previous version, <codeInline>2014-07-31-Preview</codeInline>, is deprecated and will be removed from the service in the future.

trans-unit.source: Although the version numbers of the Management and Service REST APIs often coincide, the Management REST API has an independent versioning path.
trans-unit.target: Although the version numbers of the Management and Service REST APIs often coincide, the Management REST API has an independent versioning path.

trans-unit.source: Over time, the <codeInline>api-version</codeInline> numbers of the REST APIs are more likely to diverge than stay the same.
trans-unit.target: Over time, the <codeInline>api-version</codeInline> numbers of the REST APIs are more likely to diverge than stay the same.

trans-unit.source: Version List
trans-unit.target: Version List

trans-unit.source: Locked versions of the API are recommended for production applications.
trans-unit.target: Locked versions of the API are recommended for production applications.

trans-unit.source: Preview versions have experimental features that do not always move forward into a locked version.
trans-unit.target: Preview versions have experimental features that do not always move forward into a locked version.

trans-unit.source: We strongly advise against using prototype APIs in production applications.
trans-unit.target: We strongly advise against using prototype APIs in production applications.

trans-unit.source: Although newer versions are recommended, previous versions remain available for a limited period of time.
trans-unit.target: Although newer versions are recommended, previous versions remain available for a limited period of time.

trans-unit.source: Version (newest to oldest)
trans-unit.target: Version (newest to oldest)

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: Status

trans-unit.source: Feature changes <superscript>1</superscript>
trans-unit.target: Feature changes <superscript>1</superscript>

trans-unit.source: Preview<superscript>2</superscript>
trans-unit.target: Preview<superscript>2</superscript>

trans-unit.source: Adds Microsoft natural language processors for up to 50 languages, with improved text analysis and indexing for all languages.
trans-unit.target: Adds Microsoft natural language processors for up to 50 languages, with improved text analysis and indexing for all languages.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8f35915a-2bfa-4f23-80c3-e3f54e9e4543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Language support (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8f35915a-2bfa-4f23-80c3-e3f54e9e4543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Language support (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <languageKeyword>moreLikeThis</languageKeyword> query parameter, useful when you want to find documents that are relevant to another specific document.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <languageKeyword>moreLikeThis</languageKeyword> query parameter, useful when you want to find documents that are relevant to another specific document.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="716ef056-adf4-4b16-85b8-2cb777bc8458" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Search Documents (Azure Search Service REST API)</link> for details about this feature.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="716ef056-adf4-4b16-85b8-2cb777bc8458" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Search Documents (Azure Search Service REST API)</link> for details about this feature.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>moreLikeThis</languageKeyword> and natural language analyzers provided by Microsoft are the only differences between <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline> and <codeInline>2015-02028-Preview</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>moreLikeThis</languageKeyword> and natural language analyzers provided by Microsoft are the only differences between <codeInline>2015-02-28</codeInline> and <codeInline>2015-02028-Preview</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Lucene analyzers are in all versions except <codeInline>2014-07-31-Preview</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Lucene analyzers are in all versions except <codeInline>2014-07-31-Preview</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Locked
trans-unit.target: Locked

trans-unit.source: General release <superscript>3</superscript>
trans-unit.target: General release <superscript>3</superscript>

trans-unit.source: Includes all the features described in <codeInline>2014-10-20-Preview</codeInline>, plus the following additional features.
trans-unit.target: Includes all the features described in <codeInline>2014-10-20-Preview</codeInline>, plus the following additional features.

trans-unit.source: Indexers API, used to simplify document load operations from Azure SQL Database and DocumentDB.
trans-unit.target: Indexers API, used to simplify document load operations from Azure SQL Database and DocumentDB.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="99bd2afa-3413-424c-a54a-58c8bb12bdbe" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Indexer operations (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="99bd2afa-3413-424c-a54a-58c8bb12bdbe" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Indexer operations (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK for Azure Search (provides built-in classes for creating and querying indexes).
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK for Azure Search (provides built-in classes for creating and querying indexes).

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search .NET SDK</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn951165.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search .NET SDK</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn951165.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Preview
trans-unit.target: Preview

trans-unit.source: Adds several new features, including:
trans-unit.target: Adds several new features, including:

trans-unit.source: Lucene language analyzers, including ability to specify an ASCIIfolding filter that can help with removing diacritics.
trans-unit.target: Lucene language analyzers, including ability to specify an ASCIIfolding filter that can help with removing diacritics.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="8f35915a-2bfa-4f23-80c3-e3f54e9e4543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Language support (Azure Search REST API)</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="8f35915a-2bfa-4f23-80c3-e3f54e9e4543" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Language support (Azure Search REST API)</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: Support for Edm.Int64 data type.
trans-unit.target: Support for Edm.Int64 data type.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="cc08c9f9-2aff-420f-b01a-bbde2e051c08" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported data types (Azure Search)</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="cc08c9f9-2aff-420f-b01a-bbde2e051c08" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported data types (Azure Search)</link>.

trans-unit.source: Suggesters API (provides more powerful type-ahead or auto-complete queries, including support for fuzzy matching.
trans-unit.target: Suggesters API (provides more powerful type-ahead or auto-complete queries, including support for fuzzy matching.

trans-unit.source: To create suggesters, see the "Suggesters" section in <link xlink:href="ecafed05-c746-4d9e-ac8e-653066e909b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Index (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: To create suggesters, see the "Suggesters" section in <link xlink:href="ecafed05-c746-4d9e-ac8e-653066e909b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Index (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: To use them, see <link xlink:href="b3fed159-774d-42e0-8ded-ee453f6cd857" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suggestions (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: To use them, see <link xlink:href="b3fed159-774d-42e0-8ded-ee453f6cd857" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suggestions (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: Tag scoring profiles, used for boosting the search rank of documents based on personalized information exposed through tags (such as boosting brand preferences based on shopping history).
trans-unit.target: Tag scoring profiles, used for boosting the search rank of documents based on personalized information exposed through tags (such as boosting brand preferences based on shopping history).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="719b924e-6d8a-43c1-b7b0-827487020e3a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add scoring profiles to a search index (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="719b924e-6d8a-43c1-b7b0-827487020e3a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add scoring profiles to a search index (Azure Search Service REST API)</link>.

trans-unit.source: All of these features are now part of the general release and are documented in MSDN.
trans-unit.target: All of these features are now part of the general release and are documented in MSDN.

trans-unit.source: Locked
trans-unit.target: Locked

trans-unit.source: Public preview release.
trans-unit.target: Public preview release.

trans-unit.source: <superscript>1</superscript> Feature announcements can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Latest updates to Azure Search</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/search-latest-updates/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: <superscript>1</superscript> Feature announcements can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Latest updates to Azure Search</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/search-latest-updates/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You can also read about features in <link xlink:href="a47e2a88-f9f9-4731-ab5f-e30ba1b5262b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Search Overview</link>.
trans-unit.target: You can also read about features in <link xlink:href="a47e2a88-f9f9-4731-ab5f-e30ba1b5262b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Search Overview</link>.

trans-unit.source: <superscript>2</superscript> Preview features are not guaranteed to be migrated to a locked release.
trans-unit.target: <superscript>2</superscript> Preview features are not guaranteed to be migrated to a locked release.

trans-unit.source: Whereas features in a locked version are considered stable and unlikely to change with the exception of small backward-compatible fixes and enhancements, preview features are available for testing and experimentation, with the goal of gathering feedback on feature design and implementation.
trans-unit.target: Whereas features in a locked version are considered stable and unlikely to change with the exception of small backward-compatible fixes and enhancements, preview features are available for testing and experimentation, with the goal of gathering feedback on feature design and implementation.

trans-unit.source: However, because preview features are not locked, we recommend against writing production code that takes a dependency on preview versions.
trans-unit.target: However, because preview features are not locked, we recommend against writing production code that takes a dependency on preview versions.

trans-unit.source: <superscript>3</superscript> General availability means that Azure Search is now under the service level agreement (SLA).
trans-unit.target: <superscript>3</superscript> General availability means that Azure Search is now under the service level agreement (SLA).

trans-unit.source: The SLA can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search Service Level Agreements</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/sla/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: The SLA can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search Service Level Agreements</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/sla/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: This is the only API version that is under SLA.
trans-unit.target: This is the only API version that is under SLA.

trans-unit.source: Azure Search Service REST API: 2014-10-20-Preview
trans-unit.target: Azure Search Service REST API: 2014-10-20-Preview

trans-unit.source: Azure Search Service REST API: 2014-07-31-Preview
trans-unit.target: Azure Search Service REST API: 2014-07-31-Preview
